column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Not that I'm knocking it! It's pretty tasty
column2: all around. I liked the buttery crust
column4: and the healthy smattering of toppings. It was all pretty solid. But the sauce was just not hitting it for me... no seasoning
column6: no spices. Just tomato-y and slightly acidic (which was actually all right.)
